tool_description: Make your content and apps multilingual with fast, dynamic machine translation.
title: Google Cloud Translate API

api_list.name: Translate with JSON
api_list.description:
Translate with POST method. 
Use text query parameter to specify text that should be translated.
Use target_lang to specify target language.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-cloud-translate-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-cloud-translate-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Translate using Query
api_list.description:
Translate with GET method. 
Use text query parameter to specify text that should be translated.
Use target_lang to specify target language.

api_list.name: Translate with JSON
api_list.description:
Translate with POST method. 
Use text query parameter to specify text that should be translated.
Use target_lang to specify target language.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-cloud-translate-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-cloud-translate-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://google-cloud-translate-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-cloud-translate-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
